participant_1.background:
I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
i could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it.

participant_2.background:
I was born in the big city, but I now live in the country with my dog.
i do not like to eat meat.
I sometimes get distracted by my phone when I'm trying to work.
i wish i could live in iceland.
when i was a child i was kidnapped by my uncle.

content.text: Hey there! I'm from the big city, but now I live in the country with my dog. How about you?
I was born in the big city, but now I live in the country too! I love it here.
It's so peaceful! I like to wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
My dog is the best part of my day, too! I take him to our lake in the backyard every day and watch him swim as I drink my tea.
That sounds so relaxing! I love taking my dog to the park, but it's not the same as having a lake right in your backyard.
It's the best! I also love to cook for my dog. I don't eat meat, but I love to make him all sorts of delicious meatloafs.
That's so sweet! I'm the opposite, I could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it.
I guess we're just opposites! What's your favorite place to eat?
I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I'm the same way! I love trying new restaurants and cuisines.
I think that's what makes life so much fun! Exploring new places and trying new things.
